item.title: Getting SQL Server installation date with PowerShell using dbatools
item.description:
Most of my writing time at the moment is devoted to Â Learn dbatools in a Month of Lunches which is now available but here is a short post following a question someone asked me.

How can I get the Installation Date for SQL Server on my estate into a database with dbatools ?

You can get the date that SQL Server was installed using the creation date of the NT Authority\System login using T-SQL
